examples.example: 今天妈妈买了一只柴鸡，准备给我们做一顿美味的大餐。

translate.english: Today mother bought a free-range chicken and is going to prepare a delicious big meal for us.

examples.example: 在乡村的农家小院，一群快乐的孩子正在追逐那只活泼的柴鸡。

translate.english: In the rural farmhouse courtyard, a group of happy children are chasing that lively free-range chicken.

examples.example: 奶奶在院子里养了一群柴鸡，每天都能收获新鲜的鸡蛋。

translate.english: Grandma raises a group of free-range chickens in the yard and can harvest fresh eggs every day.
